And another problem is that neither pytorch lu decomposition nor pytorch lu factorization returns a link to documentation of torch.btrifact. Maybe some bad SEO-friendliness of docs?

body:
Searching for `pytorch lu factorization` returns this in top 5:
```
torch.functional — PyTorch 0.1.11_5 documentation
pytorch-zh.readthedocs.io/en/latest/_modules/torch/functional.html
def btriunpack(LU_data, LU_pivots, unpack_data=True, unpack_pivots=True): """Unpacks the data and pivots from a batched LU factorization (btrifact) of a ...
```

And another problem is that neither `pytorch lu decomposition` nor `pytorch lu factorization` returns a link to documentation of `torch.btrifact`. Maybe some bad SEO-friendliness of docs?
